location.name: Post Falls, ID
location.address: 3726 E Mullan Ave Post Falls ID, 83854

content.title: Striving to be our very best
content.description: We pride ourselves in having a well-trained and extremely diverse staff, and they are ready to assist you with your needs and concerns. Not sure who to contact? Call our main desk (208) 457-3891 and we will be happy to direct your call to the right person, 8:30am – 4:30pm, Monday through Thursday and until 4:00 pm on Friday. The people of Disability Action Center NW, Inc. work to promote the independence and equality of all individuals with disabilities in all aspects of society.

content.title: The Post Falls & Coeur d’Alene Community
content.description: Post Falls and Coeur d’Alene is the perfect mash-up of small-town vibe and big-city atmosphere. Blessed with natural beauty that most people can only dream about, it has a true four-season climate. The stable economy, low crime rate, and the 6th lowest cost of living in the U.S. attract many looking for a new place to call home, or relocate their business to a location that offers them and their employees an amazing lifestyle in the heart of paradise. For more information, visit Post Falls Chamber of Commerce.

content.title: The Lewiston Community
content.description: Lewiston is located at the conjunction of two rivers and enjoys more warm and sunny days than almost any other place in the northwest. Recreational opportunities abound in the Lewis-Clark Valley. It offers premier water-skiing, jet boating, sailing, rafting, hunting & fishing, camping and more. Miles of accessible paved levee pathways follow the rivers for walking jogging and biking. A thriving port system, competitive business operation costs and highly acclaimed Lewis-Clark State College give Lewiston a great quality of life. For more information, visit Lewis Clark Valley Chamber of Commerce.
